name: Haxorus
author: Anesaki Dynamic
flavor_text: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.

abilities.name: Grind Up
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard any Stadium card in play. If you do, attach up to 3 in any combination of {R} and {M} Energy cards from your hand to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Powerful Axe
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 more damage times the amount of basic Energy attached to this Pokémon.
